ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF((CONTAINS( Name, "January")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "February")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "March")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "April")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "May")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "June")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "July")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "August")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "September")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "October")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "November")), false, true), IF((CONTAINS( Name, "December")), false, true) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Operation Queue Name must include Month and Year (ie. "January 2022")
